channel.title: Introduction on Qtlex API
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on Qtlex API

item.title: Authenication
item.description: Authorize users or modify user credentials. User authenication give access to particular api according to user type. Currently three type of user exists. Buyer Seller Admin Authenicate users You can authenicate users by sending post request with username and password through api. API call qtlex.qtlomics.com/api/v1/login Parameters parmeter required description q optional no parameter as such Examples of API calls curl -I --header "Content-Type: application/javascript" --request POST --data @request.

item.title: Content
item.description: This is first draft There is some code curl -X GET http://localhost:8000 Python Code Block print("Hello, World") Javascript Code Block console.log("Hello, World") Shell Code Block echo "Hello, World" Curl Command This is curl command API call API Call /categories call categories /get get categories
